message: Start with a small amount for Bob to get him interested
Let's be fair and split it evenly. What do you say?
You can have a bit more, but I'm not giving up my majority yet
I'm willing to compromise. How about we split it 40/60?  It's closer to your initial offer, but gives me a bit more to work with.
You're getting closer, but I'm still the one with the upper hand
Let's try 45/55. I'm being more flexible, but I'm also not going to settle for much less than half.
You're getting close to my minimum, but I'm not budging much more
We're running out of time. I'm willing to stick with my last offer of 40/60. Let's avoid getting nothing at all!
